reg_pit.title: Development Cost Charge Amendment Bylaw Approval Exemption Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 130/2018, effective June 15, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Subject to subsections (2) and (3), a development cost charge amendment bylaw is exempt from the approval requirement in section 937Â [adoption procedures for development cost charge bylaw] of the Local Government Act if

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) (b) (i) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 130/2018, effective June 15, 2018.

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: in respect of a municipality in the Greater Vancouver Regional District or Fraser Valley Regional District, the percentage change in the Vancouver consumer price index,
